title: First Communion
occurrences: Adele? - That's his daughter, she too does her first communion today.
On First Communion day you can't trifle. - Oh, sorry, it's a serious thing.
Be kind, my daughter has her first communion, this is her dress...
He stole the first communion dress of my daughter! How do I do?
would you mind if your daughter did First Communion another day?
And you wait the day of first communion to think about the dress?
